Description: Pottery ostracon, with one line of incised inscription - Coptic (?), from the rim of a vessel, inside rim a line of yellow paint with four rough black circles, two joined.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394044) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394044)
